Executive Assistant Job at Veritasi Homes and Properties Limited




        
    

        
        Veritasi Homes and Properties is a real estate company based in Lagos State, Nigeria. With a focus on property development, we have a diverse property portfolio developed from successful projects. We are dedicated to providing investment opportunities for our partners in the Nigerian real estate market.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Executive Assistant

Job Location: Lagos, Nigeria
Employment Type: Full-Time

Role Description
     

            
    




	The Executive Assistant will serve as a trusted partner to the CEO, providing high-level administrative, operational, and strategic support.
	This role requires exceptional organizational skills, discretion, and the ability to anticipate needs in a fast-paced environment.
	Manage and maintain the CEO’s calendar, scheduling meetings, appointments, and travel.
	Prepare and organize documents, presentations, and reports for meetings.
	Act as the first point of contact between the CEO and internal/external stakeholders.
	Coordinate executive communications, including taking calls, responding to emails, and interfacing with clients.
	Handle confidential information with the highest level of integrity.
	Support project management and follow up on action items from executive meetings.
	Oversee administrative processes and assist with special projects as required.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration or related field preferred.
	Minimum of 4 years of experience in an Executive Assistant or similar high-level administrative role.
	At least 2 years of experience directly supporting senior/executive personnel (CEO, MD, Director).
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	High level of discretion, professionalism, and ability to work under pressure.
	Strong proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, PowerPoint, Excel, Outlook) and other productivity tools.
	Exceptional organizational and time-management skills with keen attention to detail.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: career@veritasihomes.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
